spice.basic
Class AxisAndAngle

java.lang.Object
  spice.basic.AxisAndAngle

public class AxisAndAngle
extends java.lang.Object

Class AxisAndAngle provides containers for rotation axis and angle combinations.

Version 1.0.0 08-DEC-2009 (NJB)
